channel.title: Cybersecurity on Are we there yet?
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on Are we there yet?

item.title: Cybersecurity 2022
item.description: Cybersecurity - 2022 Roadmap? This is a question I have been asking myself over the last two months. How do I get into Cybersecurity? It’s a maze of opinions and ideas and I have listened to multiple podcasts, watched countless YouTube videos with some great people giving advice that I have learned from. But … and I don’t mean it as a but that negates what I wrote earlier … but I have to ask myself, what am I passionate about, what’s my vision of the future, what am I naturally good at?
